channel.title: Some one plzz help me
channel.description: i have tried about 20 diffrent scar scripts and the same thing happens everytime. i will run scar after using the cross hair thing and setting the colors then i start it. it says scar is running and working succefully, but all that happens is my mouse goes to the bottom of the screen stays there and i cannot move it. it does not even open the rs window or do anything with rs can some one tell me what im doing rwrong plz

item.title: Some one plzz help me
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

no i know what it is. purest, you have to have the rs screen already up and running. from what i understand you are just starting the script and wanting it to go and open up rs and pick the world and everything for you. well YOU need to be at the login screen on rs then specify the window with the crosshair. only some scripts will open the rs2 window by their self but most require you to be at the login screen already. reply on how things go ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: June 24, 2006, 10:20:38 am[/size][hr]so was i right or are you still having problems?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Probably just didn’t set it to the correct client.

item.title: Some one plzz help me
item.dc:creator: @Truth Truth
item.description:
@Truth wrote:

Fix your crosshair thingy, I mean by this, Right before you run the script put the crosshair on your runescape window. Otherwise its the script.

Read full topic
